name: Slide Puzzle Game Deluxe
description:
This game is a simple remake of the classic 15 piece sliding puzzle. It includes a timer and move counter.

The game starts by randomly shifting 50 pieces. While this can vary wildly in difficulty it makes for a fun challenge. Highscores exist for both fastest time and fewest moved.

I don't foresee myself working on this any more than critical bug fixes.

Font made by wepfont
Background made by Kenney.NL
